#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start an Education Franchise
#Text=Business
#Text=There is always a huge demand for good education institutions in India and thus this segment offers options for more business opportunities .
#Text=The education franchise industry has been growing leaps and bounds with scope for more investors and entrepreneurs .
#Text=If planned properly you can start your new education franchise business and begin a rewarding career today .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Research Properly : Several education-based franchise opportunities are offered by well-known education brands .
#Text=You should research these opportunities thoroughly you ’re your own and if possible ask 3rd party sources to come to a conclusion .
#Text=There are a wide range of options in the education franchise field and it is important to choose that suits your interest level .

#Text=Talk to Other Franchise Owners : It is a good idea to talk to other franchise owners of a particular education brand to get a good sense of the ups and downs and idea about the future prospects .
#Text=Conduct Market Research : Conduct a thorough market research on the area where you want to start your new education franchise .
#Text=Also make sure to find out if there is any competition in your area , as you may want to start your education franchise in an area without direct competition .
#Text=This is important as it would help in making your business successful in less time .
#Text=Check

#Text=Out the Requirements : Remember that each and every education franchise has different requirements as far as start-up franchise fee , available capital requirements , training , ongoing franchise royalty fees , general facilities and required equipments are concerned .
#Text=At times franchisors also look for an education related degree and teaching experience to open an education franchise .
#Text=Create a Business plan : Buying an education franchise is a serious decision that should involve a lot of consideration and diligence .

#Text=Thus , it is important to create an elaborate business plan which should include your initial start up expenses , working capital requirements and your overall marketing objectives for the business .
#Text=Apply for an Education Franchise : Choose an education brand and apply for a franchise .
#Text=Once you have been approved to open your new education franchise , be prepared to attend any required training .
#Text=This training should help you learn the franchise system , materials , equipment and management needed to successfully run your new business .
#Text=Choose a location and make the final arrangements :
#Text=Finalize a location as per the specifications required by your education franchise company .
#Text=Buy all the necessary equipments required in an education institution .
#Text=Also recruit qualified professionals to provide your educational services .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Research education franchises that match your education background
#Text=Do your own marketing to make your business profitable
#Text=Ensure you have enough money to open and support your education franchise until it breaks even .
#Text=Know the market demand in the location where you want to establish a new business to make your business successful
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Research of the market
#Text=Business plan
#Text=Budget
#Text=Interest
#Text=List of key franchisors
#Text=Ability to Invest
#Text=Communication skills
